an10.89:4.1: * Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.89:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:4.4: “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
an10.89:5.1: Dutiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:5.2: “kiñcāpi me, bhante, bhagavā saddhāyiko paccayiko, atha kho pāpicchāva sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
an10.89:6.1: Tatiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:6.2: “kiñcāpi me, bhante, bhagavā saddhāyiko paccayiko, atha kho pāpicchāva sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
an10.89:7.1: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an10.89:7.2: Acirapakkantassa ca kokālikassa bhikkhuno sāsapamattīhi pīḷakāhi sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosi.
an10.89:7.3: Sāsapamattiyo hutvā muggamattiyo ahesuṃ, muggamattiyo hutvā kalāyamattiyo ahesuṃ, kalāyamattiyo hutvā kolaṭṭhimattiyo ahesuṃ, kolaṭṭhimattiyo hutvā kolamattiyo ahesuṃ, kolamattiyo hutvā āmalakamattiyo ahesuṃ, āmalakamattiyo hutvā tiṇḍukamattiyo ahesuṃ, tiṇḍukamattiyo hutvā, beḷuvasalāṭukamattiyo ahesuṃ, beḷuvasalāṭukamattiyo hutvā billamattiyo ahesuṃ, billamattiyo hutvā pabhijjiṃsu, pubbañca lohitañca pagghariṃsu.
an10.89:7.4: So sudaṃ kadalipattesu seti macchova visagilito.
an10.89:8.1: Atha kho turū paccekabrahmā yena kokāliko bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
an10.89:8.2: upasaṅkamitvā vehāse ṭhatvā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:8.7: “Nanu tvaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā anāgāmī byākato, atha kiñcarahi idhāgato?
an10.89:9.1: Atha kho turū paccekabrahmā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
an10.89:14.1: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu teneva ābādhena kālamakāsi.
an10.89:14.2: Kālaṅkato ca kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā.
an10.89:15.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.89:15.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:15.5: Kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
an10.89:15.7: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an10.89:16.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.89:16.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an10.89:16.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati maṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:16.6: kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā’ti.
an10.89:16.8: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an10.89:17.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.89:17.2: “kīva dīghaṃ nu kho, bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇan”ti?
an10.89:17.5: ‘ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā’”ti.
an10.89:18.3: “* seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya.
an10.89:18.4: Khippataraṃ kho so, bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
an10.89:18.23: Padumaṃ kho pana, bhikkhu, nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
an10.89:18.25: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
